ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but my calling has only made them more evasive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But the more I called, they only ran the farther away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but the more I called, the farther they fled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but it has had no effect on them except to make them run away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So for them, my calling them increased their fleeing away.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But all my calling added nothing but to (their) flight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But my call has only made them flee the more:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but my calling has only increased them in flight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But all my calling doth but add to their repugnance;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but my pleas have only increased their aversion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And my calling hath only increased them in fleeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but my summons only increases their evasion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But all my calling added nothing but to (their) flight (from the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but my call has only increased them in running away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But my call added only to their flight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:6] but my summon has only increased their evasion, of faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But all my calling) to them to repent and believe in Allah's divine Oneness (doth but add to their repugnance) does but increase their remoteness from faith and repentance;
